title: controlled aram selection & new nida skin?
body:
if aram was to get serious, then you should be able to ban 1 of your champions, for every 5 champs you own... interesting concept?
or if you like them all, then just dont ban any, mmm...

additionally thought of a maddd as funny skin set, like all skillshot champs, particularly nidalee
should have a, Olympian Skin (since Javelin Throwings a real sport) that'll be a cool as skin, LOL

what do you think??

replies.body: Nidalee recently got a new skin so it would be really unlikely for that to happen anytime soon.
